post.body: all I can say us: wow. You're a lyrical genius, my boy! (j/k. Very high school English assignment-ish)
I so want to read your poems! You know if they're good, you'll have to starting writing poems for me, right?
such a casual tweet-- rushing off to Paris, just another errand. I am so jealous of your life right now!
you're so cute! I can't wait to see your house decorated for Christmas!
and @kylike2 happy anniversary!
I know you love it. I wasn't asking you. Is your name kyleike2? Well, I guess his isn't either...
OMG! First tooth?it'll still be there when I see him, right? I can be there for this momentous occasion!
are those Enders books good? Do you think I'd like them?
Showing off my new earrings to coworkers http://snipurl.com/8zzds
Boss is on vacation today, and I feel like I should be too. Unfortunately, I'm not. Hopefully othr ppl r too cuz I got lots of calls to make
May be my best Christmas ever-- day spent with brandon has been delightful! And he gave me beautiful diamond earrings!
I can't believe it's only 18 degrees outside! But it's the perfect day to celebrate Christmas with my love.
Oh wait, I meant graduation. We celebrated brandon's graduation yesterday. Can you tell how tired I was last night?
After an evening out celebrating brandon's birthday, I'm ready to hit the sack.
Too much to do at work today, so stuff's getting pushed back to next week. But really, what else will be happening next week???
I frosted my own cookie this morning at work http://snipurl.com/8vyis
Everyone should check out goodshop and goodsearch dot coms
Waiting for the best fianc√© ever to stop by the office with a coffee treat for me. Isn't he just great?
Lots of drama today. Oh the joys of being engaged-- little things seem like big deals.
Is listening to Jon Foreman solo CD for first time in months. It's really great, which I just now realized!
